results.title: [Correction of portal hypertension and renal dysfunction with help of nebivolol and lizinopril in patients with hepatic cirrhosis].
results.text_hl: The effect of nebevolol, beta-blocker on the @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Portal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006975 @@@portal hypertension@@@ and renal blood flow and the safety of its use versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, an @GENE_ACE @GENE_1636 @@@angiotensin-converting enzyme@@@ inhibitor were examined in the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@cirrhosis@@@. 72 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were examined (39 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@cirrhosis of the liver@@@ without @DISEASE_Ascites @DISEASE_MESH:D001201 @@@ascites@@@ - the 1st group and 32 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@cirrhosis of the liver@@@ with @DISEASE_Ascites @DISEASE_MESH:D001201 @@@ascites@@@ - the 2nd group.

citations.NLM: Fedulenkova LV. [Correction of portal hypertension and renal dysfunction with help of nebivolol and lizinopril in patients with hepatic cirrhosis]. Eksp Klin Gastroenterol. 2009;(5):130-7. PMID: 20201315
citations.BibTeX: @article{20201315, title={[Correction of portal hypertension and renal dysfunction with help of nebivolol and lizinopril in patients with hepatic cirrhosis].}, author={Fedulenkova LV}, journal={Eksp Klin Gastroenterol}, number={5}, pages={130-7}}

results.title: [Efficacy of lisinopril and nebivolol therapy of portal hypertension and kidney dysfunction in patients with liver cirrhosis].
results.text_hl: [Efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@ therapy of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Portal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006975 @@@portal hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@kidney dysfunction@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver cirrhosis@@@].

citations.NLM: Fedulenkova LV, Drozdov VN, Mikheeva OM, Petrakov AV. [Efficacy of lisinopril and nebivolol therapy of portal hypertension and kidney dysfunction in patients with liver cirrhosis]. Eksp Klin Gastroenterol. 2008;(5):37-41. PMID: 19145915

results.title: [Correction of portal hypertension by beta-adrenoblockers (atenolol and metoprolol) and inhibitors of ACE (lisinopril and enalapril) in liver cirrhosis].
results.text_hl: [Correction of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Portal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006975 @@@portal hypertension@@@ by beta-adrenoblockers (@CHEMICAL_Atenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@) and inhibitors of @GENE_AP2B1 @GENE_163 @@@ACE@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@) in @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver cirrhosis@@@].

citations.NLM: Lazebnik LB, Mikheeva OM, Toporkov AS, Komissarenko IA, Vasnev OS, Fedulenkova LV.
